settings.name: Distance to be calculated
settings.description: Choose to calculate movements over specified time intervals as the cumulative distance (sum of the lengths of all segments), net displacement (distance between the first and last locations), or maximum net displacement (the maximum straight-line distance of the distance matrix between all pairs of locations).

settings.name: Time length
settings.description: The length of the time in the unit selected below. For example, this interval can be for example '5 minutes', '12 hours', '3 months' or '1 year'. If 'ALL' is selected in the 'Time unit' below, this number will be ignored.

settings.name: Time unit
settings.description: The unit of the time interval over which the distance will be calculated. If 'ALL' is selected, than one distance will be calculated across all data for each track.

settings.name: Distance unit
settings.description: Choose units in which to report the calculated distances. Default is meters.
